      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>97e85657-bd3f-425a-8502-989821c89a98</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A valódi mérsékelt öv élővilága</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Ecosystem Of The Moderate Temperate Region</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Oekosystem Der Gemäßigten Mäßigen Region</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'Écosystème de la Région Tempérée 
Modérée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Ecosystem Da Região Temperate Moderada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Ecosistema Della Regione Temperata Moderata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το οικοσύστημα της μέτριας συγκρατημένης περιοχής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Ecosistema De la Región Templada Moderada</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A valódi mérsékelt öv éghajlattípusai (óceáni, nedves kontinentális, száraz kontinentális); a lombhullató erdők és a füves puszták élővilága; az emberi hatások</string>
            <string language="en-US">Climate Types of the Real Temperate Regions (Oceanic, Wet Continental, Dry Continental); Ecosystem of Decidous Forests and Grasslands, Human Influence;</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biom</string>
            <string language="en-US">biome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">mérsékelt övezet</string>
            <string language="en-US">moderate zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">lombhullató erdők</string>
            <string language="en-US">deciduous forests</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">füves puszták</string>
            <string language="en-US">grasslands</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klima-Typen vom realen mäßigen kontinentalen, 
trockenen kontinentalen der Region-(ozeanisches, nasses); 
Oekosystem der Decidous Wälder und der Wiesen, menschlicher 
Einfluß;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types de climat des vrais continentaux 
continentaux et secs de régions (océanique, humide) tempérés ; 
Écosystème des forêts de Decidous et des prairies, influence 
humaine ;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos do clima do continental continental, seco 
temperate real das regiões (oceanic, molhado); Ecosystem de 
florestas de Decidous e de grasslands, influência humana;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi di clima dei continentali continentali e 
asciutti di regioni (oceanico, bagnato) temperati reali; 
Ecosistema delle foreste di Decidous e dei pascoli, influenza 
umana;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι κλίματος των πραγματικών συγκρατημένων περιοχών
(ωκεάνειος, υγρός ηπειρωτικός, ξηρός ηπειρωτικός)  
Οικοσύστημα των δασών Decidous και των λιβαδιών, 
ανθρώπινη επιρροή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tipos del clima del continental continental, seco
templado verdadero de las regiones (oceánico, mojado); 
Ecosistema de los bosques y de los prados, influencia humana de 
Decidous;</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">biome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gemäßigte Zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">laubwechselnde Wälder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wiesen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zone modérée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forêts à feuilles caduques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">prairies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biologia</string>
          </keyword>
